long_description: The Burton Mini Scraper mats are a great way to quickly get snow off the bottom of your boot. Plus, they provide great traction when getting off the lift. Durable urethane construction stands up to the cold. Set of two 2 in. discs easily attach to board; simply pull off adhesive backing and attach.
short_description: The Burton Mini Scraper mats are a great way to quickly get snow off the bottom of your boot. Plus, they provide great traction when getting off the lift.
